title: Riak Office Hours Today at 2 at BashoWest
description:
June 29, 2011

I announced last week that we were going to start holding open office hours at BashoWest. Today, at 2 Pacific, Riak office hours begin officially.

In the office today will be myself, Andy Gross, and Dan Reverri , and we’ll be at-the-ready to answer and chat about anything Riak, Erlang, open Source, etc.

Here are the official details:

  • When: Today, 2PM Pacific until about 5
  • Where: BashoWest – 929 Market St., Suite 500, San Francisco
  • How: Find “Basho” on the front door buzzer and give us a call to be let in. (If asked for a password, “webscale” or “dev/null” will suffice.)
  • Who Should Come: Anyone with questions/comments/concerns about Riak, Erlang, open source software, community building, or databases.

Shoot an email to mark@basho.com or find me on Twitter if you’ve got any specific questions or are having issues getting into or finding the office.

Hope to see you all this afternoon.

Mark
